name: Chocolate Coated Cherries (Candy)
author: Shirley Drury
instructions: In a mixing bowl, combine fondant and water. Mix well with spoon. Let set for 5 to 10 minutes. Place fondant in top section of double boiler and melt over very low boiling water. Dip cherries into fondant using the stem or a toothpick. Let set for 5 minutes and re-dip. Let fondant coated cherries set for an hour or two, then hand dip in melted chocolate coating. Place tray of hand dipped cherries in a cool place for two or three days to allow sufficient time for the fondant to convert to a syrup.
